Osu SV Object¶

class reamber.osu.OsuSvObj.OsuSvObj(offset: float = 0.0, sampleSet: int = 0, sampleSetIndex: int = 0, volume: int = 50, kiai: bool = False, multiplier: ‘float’ = 1.0)¶

Bases: reamber.osu.OsuTimingPointMeta.OsuTimingPointMeta, reamber.base.TimedObj.TimedObj

__init__(offset: float = 0.0, sampleSet: int = 0, sampleSetIndex: int = 0, volume: int = 50, kiai: bool = False, multiplier: float = 1.0) → None¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

static codeToValue(code: float) → float¶

Converts the data in the .osu file to the actual SV Value

static readString(s: str) → reamber.osu.OsuSvObj.OsuSvObj¶

Reads a single line under the [TimingPoints] Label. This must explicitly be a BPM Point.

static valueToCode(value: float) → float¶

Converts the actual SV Value to a writable float in .osu

writeString() → str¶

Exports a .osu writable string

multiplier: float = 1.0¶
